message.body: Sorry to say my dads worse. They have him on an opiate too so he's really confused about where he is and who we are. Just getting harder. I'm so sorry to be missing this much.
Girl u r where u need to be..don't worry Bob said if u make it back great and if nt its understandable...hope he strts to feel beter soon girl!! Keep in touch
I will. This is just unreal. Thanks for everything
(1/3) I know exactly what ur dealing w parents stress me out¡¡ i guess
(2/3) havein him poop aint going to work this time hah..j\k... Hes i
